name: Issue Status Annotation Tool
description: Annotates implementation plan items with status emojis and tracks progress for MSP platform development

inputs.name: report_file_path
inputs.description: Path to the Force completion report file

inputs.name: status_mapping
inputs.description: Mapping of status criteria to emoji indicators

outputs.name: annotated_report
outputs.description: Path to the annotated report file

outputs.name: status_summary
outputs.description: Summary of status counts and percentages

outputs.name: governance_records
outputs.description: Array of governance tracking records for items without Linear issues

constraints: Must preserve existing Linear issue links
Must generate unique IDs for non-Linear items
Must maintain report formatting and structure
Must create governance JSON files for future import
